2024.title: Gene‑Editing 2.0
2024.description: Next-gen CRISPR systems with improved precision and reduced off-target effects are advancing gene therapies and genetically modified crops, offering safer, more efficient applications in medicine and agriculture.

2024.title: Synthetic Biology + AI
2024.description: AI-powered platforms like SynBioAI are designing microbes that produce biofuels and specialty chemicals, revolutionizing sustainable manufacturing through synthetic biology.

2024.title: Personalized mRNA Cancer Vaccines
2024.description: Biotech companies like ImmunoGen are pioneering personalized mRNA vaccines tailored to individual tumor profiles, marking a major step in precision oncology.

2024.title: Consumer-Facing Biotech Foods
2024.description: Biotech breakthroughs brought gene-edited apples, salt-tolerant crops, purple tomatoes, ocean-farming rice, and glowing petunias to market, blending novelty with nutrition.

2024.title: Eladocagene exuparvovec (Kebilidi)
2024.description: A gene therapy fast-tracked in 2024 for treating AADC deficiency, marking a milestone in rare disease treatment.

2024.title: AlphaFold 3
2024.description: Released in 2024, AlphaFold 3 predicts structures of proteins, DNA, RNA, and ligands with high accuracy, transforming computational biology.

2024.title: Plastics-Eating Microbes
2024.description: Colossal Biosciences introduced microbes capable of degrading plastic in under two years, addressing global waste problems through biotechnology.

2024.title: Eli Lilly Acquires Verve Therapeutics
2024.description: In a $1.3 billion deal, Eli Lilly acquired Verve to expand CRISPR-based cardiovascular therapies, reflecting big pharma's gene-editing investments.

2024.title: AstraZeneca Buys EsoBiotec
2024.description: AstraZeneca's $1 billion acquisition aims to advance in-body immune cell reprogramming for cancer and autoimmune disorders.

2024.title: Kerala’s Antibiotic Resistance Breakthrough
2024.description: RGCB, IIT Madras, and TIFR discovered a novel approach to fight drug-resistant bacteria by targeting porin proteins like CymAKp in Klebsiella pneumoniae.
